article_title: Joplin VITA program sites busy preparing tax returns for free
article_text:
Joplin, MO (64801)

Today

Cloudy this morning with thunderstorms developing this afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High around 75F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%..

Tonight

Thunderstorms during the evening will give way to cloudy skies after midnight. A few storms may be severe. Low 63F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.author: Susan Redden sredden@joplinglobe.com

og.description: It's slowed a bit, but workers were preparing 140 tax returns a day after the opening of the Volunteer Income Tax Assistance office in Joplin.
